name: Dark waters / Sunset #3
description:
Dark Waters is a series of drawings that attempt to represent states of my mind during meditation processes. They manifest energetic shocks, spatial translations, explosions of color and packets of information that happen in my psyche during transcendent processes.
Sunset shows the state of balance between the contents of consciousness and the stillness of meditation; it is a state that includes everyday reality but shows it for what it is: a vibratory flow within the being.
It was made in Processing and exported with movie maker in MP4 format.

The code used is a fork of Landscape by Henrik Linusson, included in his manual of examples for Processing. You can check it here:
https://github.com/Gornajur/processing-examples/tree/master/landscape

The code of this skecht can be consulted here:
https://github.com/Gornajur/processing-examples/blob/master/Amanecer/Sunset

Both exercises have been licensed under a MIT license that you can consult here: https://github.com/Gornajur/processing-examples/blob/master/LICENSE
